title: PKN ORLEN’s subsidiary – ORLEN Upstream – has purchased bonds issued by PKN ORLEN (PKN ...
text: ( Source : PKN Orlen SA ) Polski Koncern Naftowy ORLEN S.A. (' PKN ORLEN') hereby informs that in order to optimise the management of financial liquidity within the ORLEN Capital Group , on 12 October 2015 PKN ORLEN issued short term bonds to
